item.title: NePoLaBo Live Photo Contest Results
item.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
item.content:encoded: Greetings from the Holoearth Management Team!We are pleased to announce the results of the photo contest for the December 21, 2025 virtual concert â€œNePoLaBo Live re:VISION Holoearth Live.â€ Thank you for the many great submissions! All of the entries that conveyed the love for NePoLaBo and the passion of the performance moved the entire staff.After a careful review, the winning entries that shone especially brightly have been selected and are presented here. They are also posted on bulletin boards in Alternative City in Holoearth, so be sure to check them out!This composition, emphasizing the bond between Nene and all the Nekko fans, captured our hearts!This shot powerfully captures the charm of Nene the idol!Polka is looking at me! This shot really shows the sense of presence that makes you feel you are really there with the talent!It is moving to see Polka giving such an intense, passionate performance before her fans!A focus on Lamy unique to viewing in Holoearth! The sense and creativity here are amazing!A stunningly beautiful shot packed with Lamyâ€™s beauty and cuteness!A cute, dynamic shot capturing the ever-energetic Botan! Very kawaii!Botan locking eyes with her sharp, cool gaze! Absolutely captivating!This shot perfectly captures the close bond between the four members of NePoLaBo!Another brilliant shot that makes you feel the charm of the four as performers!Holoearth Tourism Agency Honorable MentionAlthough it did not meet certain entry requirements and could not be selected, we were blown away by this unique composition idea and decided to give it an honorable mention! (The honorary mention is featured only in this article.)

item.title: Mining Base Reveals hololive English Collaboration Gaming PC Collection
item.author: Horii
item.content:encoded: December 29, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced a new merchandise collaboration with Mining Base Co., Ltd in partnership with hololive production, featuring talents from hololive English -Myth- and hololive English -Promise-.This collaboration introduces a special series of hololive English collaboration PC products, combining Mining Baseâ€™s advanced PC hardware expertise with designs inspired by the worlds and personalities of hololive English talents. Each item is crafted to deliver both high performance and strong visual presence, staying true to Astromedaâ€™s concept of â€œgaming PCs designed to be displayed.â€The lineup includes a wide range of items, from fully built PCs to customizable accessories, allowing fans to enjoy the collaboration at multiple levels.For more information, please visit Mining Baseâ€™s official website and social media platforms. 7 models Ã— 2 versions: Myth / Promise Mini Rubber Type (Each available in Myth / Promise designs)ãƒ» Interchangeable Panel Sets 2 types: Myth / Promise 2 types: Myth / Promise From December 29, 2025 to December 29, 2026 Available exclusively in JapanAstromeda is a gaming PC brand launched in 2018, created to redefine the image of gaming PCs as part of interior design rather than devices hidden under desks. From its early days, Astromeda gained attention for its industry leading illuminated designs, transforming the conventional perception of gaming PCs as plain and invisible.In recent years, Astromeda has actively developed collaboration models with various IPs, popular anime, and game titles, leveraging its unique design philosophy and craftsmanship. These special edition PCs, carefully designed to reflect each collaborationâ€™s world and aesthetic, have received high praise from fans.With the concept of â€œa gaming PC you want to place on your desk,â€ Astromeda continues to focus not only on performance, but also on the value of visual appeal, aiming to make everyday PC life more enjoyable and more personal.

item.title: New Year Period Holoearth Service Inquiries & Creator Item Review Hours
item.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
item.content:encoded: Greetings from the Holoearth Management Team!Holoearth support hours during the New Year period will change as follows regarding Holoearth service inquiries and the Creator item review process. Closed between Dec 30, 2025 â€“ Jan 4, 2026. (Responses will resume in order from Jan 5, 2026.) Item reviews will continue during this period (Some items may take additional time to process.)

item.title: hololive production COUNTDOWN LIVE 2025â–·2026 Ã— Holoearth Special Guests Announcement
item.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
item.content:encoded: Greetings from the Holoearth Management Team!Natsuiro Matsuri, Otonose Kanade, Kikirara Vivi, and Rindo Chihaya will appear as special guests for â€œhololive production COUNTDOWN LIVE 2025â–·2026 Ã— Holoearth,â€ to be held in Holoearth on December 31, 2025. Be sure to enjoy the watch party with the talents in Holoearth! (Schedule is subject to change.) Anyone can join in the festivities for free by downloading and installing Holoearth. (Note: Holoearth is available only for Windows.)

item.title: Dec 31 COUNTDOWN LIVE Watch Party & Kyo-no-Miyako Reopening Announcement
item.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
item.content:encoded: Greetings from the Holoearth Management Team!The event â€œhololive production COUNTDOWN LIVE 2025â–·2026,â€ presented by hololive production on December 31, 2025, will also be streamed within Holoearth. Enjoy watching the show together and spend the final moments of 2025 in Holoearth! (Schedule is subject to change.) Anyone can join in the festivities for free by downloading and installing Holoearth. (Note: Holoearth is available only for Windows.)Starting at 18:00 (JST) on Sunday, December 28, 2025, Kyo-no-Miyako will reopen for a limited time. New additions include photo spots and a large theater screen for simultaneous viewing. At the shrine filled with a New Yearâ€™s atmosphere, be sure to draw an â€œomikujiâ€ fortune and try your luck for 2026. (Schedule is subject to change.)New Shop: â€œGofukuya Tsubakiâ€A new avatar fashion shop, â€œGofukuya Tsubaki,â€ will open in Kyo-no-Miyako. Enjoy the New Year in Holoearth wearing gorgeous outfits inspired by traditional Japanese aesthetics. item.title: The Guardians Behind the Scenes: Moderators Who Keep hololive production Safe Around the Clock
item.author: å¹³æ¾æ¢¨æ²™
item.content:encoded: The core principles for moderators at hololive production are very simple: â€œRespect what our viewers have to sayâ€ and â€œAlways try to find a reason to keep a comment whenever possible.â€While it may seem simple to identify potential sources of controversy or harmful remarks and respond accordingly, such work has become increasingly complex in light of recent social diversity. A statement that feels normal to one person may still hurt another, meaning that moderators are required to engage with all cases carefully, precisely, and calmly.Â Our goal is to create a space that feels like a one-on-one conversation between the talents and the audience. To make that possible, the ideal situation is to remain as unseen as possible. Weâ€™re invisible most of the time, but when necessary, we step in. If we can continue to be a kind of quiet, shadow-like presence, weâ€™d be truly happy.Â

item.title: NePoLaBo 3D Archive Special Session: â€œNePoLaBo Live re:VISION Holoearth Liveâ€
item.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
item.content:encoded: Watch the 3D Archive With NePoLaBo!Greetings from the Holoearth Management Team!The virtual concert â€œNePoLaBo Live re:VISION Holoearth Live,â€ which was held in Holoearth on December 21, is available as a 3D archive.Cast: hololive 5th Generation â€œNePoLaBoâ€ (Momosuzu Nene / Omaru Polka / Yukihana Lamy / Shishiro Botan)A special 3D archive viewing session has been officially announced, where you can attend the concert once again! In this session, hololive 5th Generation â€œNePoLaBoâ€ (Momosuzu Nene / Omaru Polka / Yukihana Lamy / Shishiro Botan) will appear in Holoearth and participate together with everyone.Join the event once againâ€”together with NePoLaBo!Watch together with NePoLaBo!3D Archive Special Session: â€œNePoLaBo Live re:VISION Holoearth Liveâ€Date & time(Schedule is subject to change.)An â€œUrya-oi!â€ Event Together with NePoLaBo!During this special 3D archive session, to celebrate the release of Momosuzu Neneâ€™s all-out â€œwotageiâ€ â€œUrya-oi!â€ gesture, a special event will be held where everyone joins together with the NePoLaBo members to fill the venue with chants of â€œUrya-oi! Urya-oi!â€.Everyone together, letâ€™s go! â€œUrya-oi! Urya-oi! Urya-oi! Urya-oi!â€Feel free to practice in advance!Missed the show? Experience the Magic With the 3D Archive!With the 3D archive, where the entire venue has been preserved, you can relive the concert experience. View it from any angle in 360 degrees, focus on your oshi, take photos, and re-live your favorite moments.If you already purchased an ID Holder, you can participate again; if you do not yet have one, you can attend by purchasing it.Perhaps that certain someone may even casually drop in at some point, tooâ€¦? Be sure not to miss out on the 3D archive! Dec 21, 2025 (Sun) 21:00 â€“ Jan 4, 2026 (Sun) 23:59. item.title: OTAKU x hololive English Advent VS Justice Collaboration Merchandise Launch
item.author: Horii
item.content:encoded: December 19, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced a new merchandise collaboration with OTAKU in partnership with hololive production, featuring talents from hololive English -Advent- and hololive English -Justice.This collaboration introduces a brand new lineup of premium merchandise inspired by the concept of â€œhololive English Advent VS Justice,â€ designed to celebrate the unique personalities and worlds of the participating talents. Every item has been carefully crafted with exceptional quality.Products will be available for purchase and ready to ship from launch, while apparel items will be listed as pre-sale, with shipping scheduled for May 2026.For more information, please visit OTAKUâ€™s official website and social media platforms.December 19, 2025 (9:00 AM EST) to December 31, 2025 (11:59 PM EST)Available worldwide (excluding mainland China) OTAKU is a lifestyle brand dedicated to creating high quality merchandise inspired by global fandom culture. With a strong focus on craftsmanship and design, OTAKU aims to deliver products that fans can proudly display and enjoy in their everyday lives.

item.title: Guide: Getting the Most Out of Events in Holoearth!
item.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
item.content:encoded: Hi there! This is Anna Rocca from the Holoearth Tourism Agency.For todayâ€™s guide, I will introduce ways to better utilize Holoearth to improve your experience for NePoLaBo Liveâ€”enjoy using event items and gestures with everyone to really liven up the show!Please continue reading to be fully prepared for the day of the event!I will cover the following four categories this time:1. Interacting with other users with gestures.2. Using penlights with gestures.3. Adjusting options settings for a better experience.4. Using Photo Mode and participating in the photo contest.5. Adjusting â€œVisualsâ€ for a better experience.One way to communicate with other users in Holoearth is with gestures. Press and hold the B key to open the gesture setup screen.Click â€œEdit gesturesâ€ to display a list of gestures you have purchased, then drag and move the ones you want to set.You can set up a total of 9 sets of gestures, each using the F1-F8 keys, so try switching between them depending on the situation.You can wave penlights by combining them with gestures. You can set penlight items you have purchased in the hotbar at the bottom of the screen to make them faster to use.After doing this, click the shortcut button or press the corresponding keyboard number to use it.By combining it with gestures such as those in the â€œHype Upâ€ series, you will be able to wave the penlights.Adjusting audio settings is also useful for making the most out of a concert experience. Press the Esc key to open the global options menu, then check the Sound section.By adjusting the Media volume, you can change the volume of the performance. Set it to a level that feels comfortable for you and enjoy the show!For NePoLaBo Live, photography is allowed. You will want to capture a special memory of your own, right?Press P to switch to Photo Mode. Since you can shoot from many different angles, it offers more flexibility than a standard screenshot.Also, a photo contest is planned for the NePoLaBo Live! Try posting your best shots on X with the hashtag #NePoLaBoHoloearthLive. Your photo might be featured on the official website, or you could even receive a special giftâ€¦ For more details, check the URL below!Here, you can toggle features like â€œNaviRobo Display,â€ â€œOther Usersâ€™ Actionsâ€ (such as poppers or fireworks), and adjust the number of player models rendered in the area. Enjoy the performance in a way suited just for you!

item.title: An Unprecedented Challenge: Usada Pekora in DEATH STRANDING â€“ A Conversation with KOJIMA PRODUCTIONS
item.author: cover_hirata
item.content:encoded: This project really reaffirmed for us just how strong KOJIMA PRODUCTIONSâ€™ reach is in overseas markets. With Pekora having been nominated in the Creator category at The Game Awards, it felt like international audiences have really accepted Pekora not as a VTuber, but as a well-known individual in her own right. This allows us to move beyond the label of â€œVTuberâ€ and break boundaries in a positive sense, and that, to me, was the most meaningful outcome of this collaboration.Â Looking at domestic impressions, the results were roughly in line with other collaborations of a similar scale. Overseas, however, impressions increased by as much as 650%. For hologra as well, comments from overseas viewers rose by 60%. These were extremely encouraging results for us.In addition, among KOJIMA PRODUCTIONâ€™s posts related to DEATH STRANDING, 28% included keywords associated with Pekora. We see this as a point where we were able to clearly communicate and deliver our value through the collaboration.

item.title: [hololive] A Special-Edition Magazine Is Set to Be Published! That hololive Member Appointed as Official Ambassador Graces the C...
Holoearth First-Timers & How to Participate in NePoLaBo Live
item.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
item.content:encoded: Hi there! This is Anna Rocca from the Holoearth Tourism Agency.With the upcoming virtual concert â€œNePoLaBo Live re:VISION Holoearth Liveâ€ on Sunday, December 21, 2025, I put together a brief guide for those who are new to Holoearth or who may be unfamiliar with how to use the service.Please continue reading to be fully prepared for the day of the event!To participate in the NePoLaBo Live concert in Holoearth, there are four things you will need to do, as listed below!1. Download for PC (Windows). 2. Register an account with Google or Apple ID. 3. Purchase the â€œNePoLaBo Live re:VISION ID Holderâ€ item in the shop in Holoearth. 4. Enter the â€œNePoLaBo re:VISION Holoearth Liveâ€ area in Holoearth after 18:00 (JST) on Dec 21 (Sun).All that is needed to use Holoearth is a PC (Windows). No VR equipment is required. See the download page for PC spec requirements. Holoearth is only available for Windows.Feel free to use the following as a detailed reference guide for how to use Holoearth and participate!1: Installing Holoearth & Account CreationThe Holoearth application must first be downloaded and installed before using the service.Download the Holoearth launcher from the download pageDownload the Holoearth Launcher from the download page and install it.After installing the launcher, launch it via the â€œHoloearth Launcherâ€ icon that was created.Click â€œInstallâ€ to begin the installation of the main Holoearth application. After installation, this button will become the â€œStartâ€ button. When an update is available, the same button will change to â€œUpdate.â€Launcher Installation TroubleshootingClick the gear icon in the upper right to open the launcher options menu, then choose â€œSupportâ€ from the menu and then â€œOpen Log Folderâ€ for the relevant error code that can be used when submitting a help inquiry.Account Creation & Logging InOnce installed, the launcher will display a â€œStartâ€ button, which will open your web browser.If you do not yet have a Holoearth account, you will be prompted to create one, using either a Google account or Apple ID.Then, agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy and click Register to finish and log in.Afterward, when Holoearth is installed and launched correctly the title menu will show the animated PV, â€œNow, discover your other world,â€ and prompt you to â€œCLICK TO START.â€On starting Holoearth for the first time, you will be asked to create your own avatar. Choose from a range of eyes, hairstyles, build options, skin tones, and more to create an avatar to your liking. You can change your avatar freely in Holoearth later, so feel free to think more about it later!After creating an avatar and entering Holoearth, you can control your avatar using a mouse and keyboard.The above controls can also be confirmed in-app via the HoloPhone menu (H key) by selecting â€œHelp.â€â– Character movement Move your avatar with WASD.Change camera angle with the mouse.â– Camera manipulation Zoom with the mouse wheel. Right click & drag to rotate your avatar.â– Opening menus Esc brings up the global settings menu. H opens the HoloPhone menu. Tab opens inventory.4: Purchase the ID Holder ItemIt is necessary to purchase the in-app â€œNePoLaBo Live re:VISION ID Holderâ€ in order to participate in NePoLaBo Live. 1. Choose Shop from the HoloPhone menu. 2. Purchase the event ID Holoder item. Note: This item is also included in the NePoLaBo Cheer Set bundles.After purchasing, you will be able to enter the concert venue in Holoearth. Note:5: How to Move to the Live Venue on Dec 211. Press H to bring up the HoloPhone menu and select â€œChange Area.â€2. From the Area List, select the â€œHoloearth Liveâ€ area and click â€œGo.â€Those who purchased the ID Holder will be able to also participate in the 3D archive after the first showing.Explore the event from different angles, take photos, and relive your favorite scenes. The 3D archive is shown at certain times of day during the archive viewing period according to the following daily schedule:Daily showtimes (JST) between Dec 21, 21:00 (JST) â€“ Jan 4, 23:59 (JST) (1) 08:00~ (2) 12:00~ (3) 19:00~ (4) 21:00~ (5) 23:00~Note: The 3D archive may be played via the event venue screens for activities such as talent watch parties.6: More Tips for a Better ExperienceBy hitting the minus (â€œ-â€œ) key, you can hide the entire UI hud display to get an unobstructed view of the concert!And that wraps it up for getting started with Holoearth and participating in NePoLaBo Live. Next time, I will share tips on how to get the most out of the Holoearth concert experience, so please look forward to it!

item.title: Beard Papaâ€™s Ã— hololive English -Justice- Collab Begins in the United States from January 3, 2026
item.author: Horii
item.content:encoded: December 16, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is pleased to announce a collaboration between hololive English -Justice- and world-famous fresh and natural cream puff chain Beard Papaâ€™s. Beginning January 3rd, 2026 for a limited time, U.S. Beard Papaâ€™s locations will debut four talent-inspired cream puffs, each themed after a member of the hololive English -Justice-.â€œWeâ€™re thrilled to collaborate with hololive English -Justice- on bringing the talents to life through our handcrafted cream puffs,â€ said Mark Nathan, Marketing Director of Beard Papaâ€™s. â€œFans love the creativity and personality of hololiveâ€™s talents, and this collaboration allowed us to create completely new flavors guided by each memberâ€™s input, while maintaining Beard Papaâ€™s signature quality.â€For more information, please visit Beard Papaâ€™s official website and social media platforms.Limited-Edition Cream Puffs made together with hololive English -Justice-During the collaboration, fans can try Beard Papaâ€™s iconic freshly baked puffs paired with flavor profiles crafted to reflect the personalities, color palettes, and motifs of each talent. These limited-edition flavors will be available for purchase at participating Beard Papaâ€™s stores nationwide.Every flavor was developed with input from the talents themselves, resulting in cream puffs that authentically capture each memberâ€™s unique style and character. The flavors and puffs are as follows:A striking pink-raspberry chocolate shell with Oreo crumble and blue nonpareils, reflecting Elizabethâ€™s bold flair and engaging presence.A bright, refreshing matcha-white chocolate dip topped with soft mini marshmallows, capturing Ceciliaâ€™s calm, green aesthetic and happy energy.Rich dark Belgian chocolate custard paired with handmade orange crumble and finishing chocolate, inspired by Gigiâ€™s bright colors and fun energy.A strawberry-vanilla crumble coating crowned with a disc-chocolate â€œhat,â€ reflecting Raoraâ€™s charisma and playful charm.Collector Combo Sets for a Unique Fan ExperienceTo complement the four limited-edition hololive English -Justice- talentâ€™s cream puffs, fans can also purchase exclusive collaboration sets available in three formats. The 4-Piece Set includes one of each talent flavor paired with a 4-sticker collectible pack featuring the hololive English -Justice- members.For guests looking to enjoy more, the 6-Piece Set includes all four talent puffs plus two Original Beard Papaâ€™s cream puffs and comes with an exclusive acrylic keychain available only through this set.For the ultimate collector, the 12-Piece Set features two full 6-packs and is bundled with a limited-edition collaboration tote bag, making it the premium option for fans and families alike.The Beard Papaâ€™s x hololive English -Justice- Collaboration Puffs will be available for a limited time at all participating Beard Papaâ€™s locations across the U.S. Online orders will be available through the Beard Papaâ€™s official app, website, and delivery partners in select markets.Originally founded in Osaka, Japan in 1999, Beard Papaâ€™s has grown into a global dessert phenomenon known for its crisp shell, fluffy choux pastry, and all-natural cream fillings made fresh daily. With locations across the U.S. and over 550 stores worldwide, Beard Papaâ€™s continues to delight fans with seasonal flavors, creative collaborations, and its signature tagline â€” â€œWorldâ€™s Best Cream Puff.â€

item.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
item.content:encoded: Greetings from the Holoearth Management Team!For the â€œNePoLaBo Live re:VISION Holoearth Liveâ€ virtual concert on December 21, 2025, we will hold a photo contest.We invite all to take in-app photos of hololive 5th Generation â€œNePoLaBoâ€ (Momosuzu Nene / Omaru Polka / Yukihana Lamy / Shishiro Botan) from various angles, and be sure to share your very best shots!NePoLaBo Live Support Campaign: Photo Contest!For â€œNePoLaBo Live re:VISION Holoearth Live,â€ screenshots & social media posts are fully welcome. Share your perfect captures with us!Top entries will be featured on the official website and receive NePoLaBo Live commemorative merch. Selected posts will also be showcased on the official X account during the contest. 1. Hide â€œNaviRoboâ€ and â€œUsernamesâ€ in the Options menu. 2. Capture in 1920Ã—1080 (Full HD) or higher. 3. Post your screenshots on X with the hashtags (no entry limit!): English: #NePoLaBoHoloearthLive Japanese: #ã­ã½ã‚‰ã¼ãƒ›ãƒ­ã‚¢ãƒ¼ã‚¹ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ–Take as many as you like! Replay the concert anytime in the 3D archive (requires purchase of the ID Holder).Note: ãƒ»Turn â€œMotion Blurâ€ off in Options (Esc key) to prevent photos from showing blur. ãƒ»In the concert venue you can use the O key shortcut to adjust the number of character models rendered and toggle other usersâ€™ effects (such as fireworks and poppers) ON/OFF. This helps reduce system load and offers more flexibility when taking photos.

item.title: [12/29 Revision: Time Extension] Announcement: â€œNePoLaBo Live re:VISION Holoearth Liveâ€ on Dec. 21
item.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
item.content:encoded: Greetings from the Holoearth Management Team!On December 21, 2025 (JST) members of hololive 5th Generation (Momosuzu Nene / Omaru Polka / Yukihana Lamy / Shishiro Botan) will hold a special virtual concert: â€œNePoLaBo Live re:VISION Holoearth Live.â€Become a virtual avatar and share the same space and experience as the NePoLaBo members. With a 360Â° front-row seat, choose any viewpoint and get up-close for an immersive concert experience where the talents are right before you within reach.After the show, relive the magic again with a 3D archive that fully preserves the entire concert space. All you need is a PC (Windows)â€”To coincide with the event, items such as member-themed accessories, penlights, and text plates will also be sold. Additionally, as part of a support campaign for the event, we plan to hold a photo contest, countdown campaigns, and more!Event name: â€œNePoLaBo Live re:VISION Holoearth Liveâ€ Cast: Momosuzu Nene / Omaru Polka / Yukihana Lamy / Shishiro Botan Hashtag: #NePoLaBoHoloearthLive Date & time: Sunday, December 21, 2025 from 19:00 (JST)About re:VISION Holoearth LiveParticipating in the Holoearth Live event requires a Windows PC with Holoearth installed and a registered account, as well as the in-app item â€œNePoLaBo Live re:VISION ID Holder.â€Equipping your avatar with the â€œNePoLaBo Live re:VISION ID Holderâ€ will grant access to the concert venue.[Exclusive Bonus Only for Holoearth]After the show, you can join a special Holoearth-exclusive segmentâ€”a unique opportunity to share the afterglow with NePoLaBo.Following the first showing, relive the concert in the 3D archive, where the entire event space is preserved. Explore the event from different perspectives, take photos, and relive your favorite scenes.The 3D archive will be held according to the designated daily schedule.Note: Holoearth is available only on Windows. In the concert venue you can use the O key shortcut to adjust the number of character models rendered and toggle other usersâ€™ effects (such as fireworks and poppers) ON/OFF. This helps reduce system load and offers more flexibility when taking photos.Due to popular demand, the event date has been extended to January 21, 2025 (Wed) at 23:59 (JST). NePoLaBo Live re:VISION ID Holder (Only one purchase per account.)ãƒ»Participate in the â€œMC Special Segmentâ€ after the show. ãƒ»Relive the show with the 3D archive afterward. ãƒ»This is the same item included in the special sets below. ãƒ»1,500 HoloCoin (Premium)Bundled sets of items for cheering on NePoLaBo members will also be for sale. This value set lets you purchase items such as penlights and mascot character hair accessories together.Due to popular demand, the event date has been extended to January 21, 2025 (Wed) at 23:59 (JST). 4,500 HoloCoin (Premium) ãƒ»NePoLaBo Live re:VISION ID Holder (single purchase only) ãƒ»Penlight Momosuzu Nene Type A (single purchase only) ãƒ»Nekko Hair Accessory ãƒ»NePoLaBo Live Celebration T Momosuzu Nene Ver. (Signed) ãƒ»NePoLaBo Live re:VISION ID Holder (single purchase only) ãƒ»Penlight Omaru Polka Type A (single purchase only) ãƒ»ZA-IN Hair Accessory ãƒ»NePoLaBo Live Celebration T Omaru Polka Ver. (Signed) ãƒ»NePoLaBo Live re:VISION ID Holder (single purchase only) ãƒ»Penlight Yukihana Lamy Type A (single purchase only) ãƒ»Yukimin Hair Accessory ãƒ»NePoLaBo Live Celebration T Yukihana Lamy Ver. (Signed)Cheer Set Shishiro Botan Set details ãƒ»NePoLaBo Live re:VISION ID Holder (single purchase only) ãƒ»Penlight Shishiro Botan Type A (single purchase only) ãƒ»SSRB Hair Accessory ãƒ»NePoLaBo Live Celebration T Shishiro Botan Ver. (Signed)Holoearth Live Event Time ScheduleFirst showing: Sunday, December 21, 2025 from 19:00 (JST).Daily showtimes (JST): (1) 08:00~ (2) 12:00~ (3) 19:00~ (4) 21:00~ (5) 23:00~This performance is pre-recorded.Screenshots from the entire performance may be posted on social media.Videos from the free portion (the first song and its MC) may be uploaded to YouTube. For other social media platforms, video posts are limited to within 30 seconds with no audio.The 3D archive may be played via the event venue screens for activities such as talent watch parties. Due to the nature of this content, which allows users to freely control the camera, it is produced in accordance with international safety standards and guidelines regarding visual display (such as flicker frequency and changes in brightness levels). However, certain user actions may still produce unexpectedly strong visual stimuli. In particular, individuals with a history of photosensitivity (such as photosensitive epilepsy or light-induced sensitivity), those who are sleep-deprived or unwell, and minors should avoid the actions listed below and exercise caution when viewing this content. Rapid and intense camera movementsâ€”such as panning quickly from side to side, tilting up and down, or repeatedly zooming in and outâ€”may cause fast motion across the screen and strong flickering.Sudden Approaches to Light Sources Suddenly moving the camera close to bright lights used in the live performance (such as stage lighting, lasers, fireworks, or effects), or filling the screen with a bright light source, may cause abrupt changes in brightness. If you experience strong visual stimulation, dizziness, nausea, convulsions, or any vision abnormalities while viewing this content, stop immediately, look away from the screen, and take a break. If symptoms do not improve, promptly seek medical attention.Please view this content at your own risk with thorough understanding of the above potential hazards. We kindly ask for your understanding and cooperation to ensure safe usage. Mirrored streaming of this performance is strictly prohibited. Uploading videos of the paid portion of this performance (after the first song and its MC) to social media or YouTube is prohibited.Watch via Streaming Ticket SPWN, ZAIKO Dec 11 (Thu), 2025 22:00 â€“ Jan 21 (Wed), 2025 22:00 (JST) Until Wednesday, January 21, 2026 at 23:59 (JST) 3,500 JPY (tax inclusive)This will be a video stream provided through SPWN and ZAIKO. Holoearthâ€™s in-app features will not be available.The archive will be available for viewing once it is prepared following the performance. During the archive viewing period the show can be viewed any number of times.As soon as the archive viewing period ends the archive footage will no longer be accessible.An additional handling fee of 220 JPY will apply when purchasing this ticket.YouTube Free-to-View SegmentThe opening portion of the live show will be streamed for free on YouTube. Videos from the free segment (the first song and its MC) may be posted on YouTube. For other social media platforms, video posts are limited to 30 seconds or less with no audio.Limited-Time Digital MerchandiseDue to popular demand, the sales period has been extended to January 21, 2025 (Wed) at 23:59 (JST). ãƒ»NePoLaBo Live Celebration T Momosuzu Nene Ver. (No Signature) ãƒ»NePoLaBo Live Celebration T Omaru Polka Ver. (No Signature) ãƒ»NePoLaBo Live Celebration T Yukihana Lamy Ver. (No Signature) ãƒ»NePoLaBo Live Celebration T Shishiro Botan Ver. (No Signature) ãƒ»Nekko Hair Accessory ãƒ»Yukimin Hair Accessory ãƒ»Penlight Momosuzu Nene Live ver. ãƒ»Penlight Omaru Polka Live ver. ãƒ»Penlight Yukihana Lamy Live ver. ãƒ»Penlight Shishiro Botan Live ver. Note: Penlights are held in both hands when used. These items cannot be used in the Simulation Room or My Space. ãƒ»Momosuzu Nene re:VISION Outfit Acrylic Stand (L) ãƒ»Omaru Polka re:VISION Outfit Acrylic Stand (L) ãƒ»Yukihana Lamy re:VISION Outfit Acrylic Stand (L) ãƒ»Shishiro Botan re:VISION Outfit Acrylic Stand (L) ãƒ»NePoLaBo Live re:VISION Key Visual Acrylic Panel ãƒ»For Momosuzu Nene ãƒ»For Yukihana LamyNew Items for Hyping Up the Show! From Dec 11 (Thu), 2025 at 21:30 (Schedule is subject to change.) ãƒ»Penlight Momosuzu Nene Type A ãƒ»Penlight Omaru Polka Type A ãƒ»Penlight Yukihana Lamy Type A ãƒ»Penlight Shishiro Botan Type A Note: Penlights are held in both hands when used. These items cannot be used in the Simulation Room or My Space. ãƒ»Momosuzu Nene Text Plate 1 Ã— 3 (Nenechi / Kon-Nene~! / Waku Waku! / Energy Drink! / HAAAN) ãƒ»Omaru Polka Text Plate 1 Ã— 3 (Polka / Omarun / Whereâ€™s Polka? / Otsu-Pol / POLMAO) ãƒ»Yukihana Lamy Text Plate 1 Ã— 3 (Lamy-chan / Kon-Lamy~ / Otsu-Lamy~ / Canâ€™t love! / Stooop) ãƒ»Shishiro Botan Text Plate 1 Ã— 3 (Shishiron / GG / La-lionâ™ª / Sasu-Shishi / poi) ãƒ»NePoLaBo Momosuzu Nene Pose ãƒ»NePoLaBo Omaru Polka Pose ãƒ»NePoLaBo Yukihana Lamy Pose ãƒ»NePoLaBo Shishiro Botan Pose From Dec 18 (Thu), 2025 after maintenance. (Schedule is subject to change.) ãƒ»Christmas PoppersConcert event shirts will take shape in the real world. The Live Celebration T-shirts, designed by NePoLaBo in Holoearth, are now available on Amazon! They are unique items that connect two different worlds: the virtual and the real.

item.title: Venue/Livestream Tickets for hololive productionâ€™s EXPO 2026 and hololive 7th fes. On Sale Starting Today!
item.author: narita
item.content:encoded: December 8, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€” COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan, CEO: Motoaki Tanigo) is excited to announce that VTuber agency hololive production will be holding its production-wide events â€œhololive SUPER EXPO 2026 Supported By BANDAIâ€ and â€œhololive 7th fes. Ridinâ€™ on Dreams Supported By LAWSONâ€ on March 6-8, 2026 at the Makuhari Messe International Exhibition Halls.The theme for EXPO 2026 is Transcend time and space and experience the vast world of hololive. At EXPO 2026, embark on a special journey that takes you all around the hololive universe with 3 main areas around a central monument where fans can discover hololive from all different perspectives.hololive will also be putting on its 7th live concert, â€œhololive 7th fes. Ridinâ€™ on Dreams.â€ There will be 4 hololive STAGES held across all 3 days, which will come alive with song and dance performances from each and every hololive talent.From 8:00 PM (JST) this evening, we will begin accepting applications for the 1st round of advance tickets (lottery) for hololive SUPER EXPO 2026 and hololive 7th fes. Tickets for the hololive 7th fes. online livestream will also go on sale on SPWN and Streaming+. We are looking forward to seeing you all at hololive productionâ€™s first-ever 3-day event!â– Official hashtag (for both EXPO and fes.) #hololivefesEXPO26Overview of â€œhololive SUPER EXPO 2026 Supported By BANDAIâ€ The theme for EXPO 2026 is where fans can enjoy a wide variety of hololive experiences in the following 3 main areas. This is the entrance to a parallel universe featuring all-new hololive experiences such as 3D footage of past live performances shown on a big screen and special interactive booths. Immerse yourself in a world packed full of hololive content, where you enjoy yourself to your heartâ€™s content with monitoring talks, a hololive Official Card Game booth and much more! Time travel through different memories we have created together and look forward to a bright future together with life-sized panels featuring original illustrations, a time capsule-themed personal items exhibit and many more experiences.In addition to these 3 areas, there will be plenty of other things for fans to enjoy throughout the entire day, including stage shows, event-limited original merchandise and a range of food and drink.Also, for EXPO 2026, we will be introducing new â€˜fast ticketsâ€™ to prevent late-night entry into the venue. We also welcome cosplay at the venue, so we are looking forward to seeing all your amazing outfits! hololive SUPER EXPO 2026 Supported By BANDAI Organizer: COVER Corporation March 6 â€“ 8, 2026 9:00 AM â€“ 6:00 PM (JST) (Last Entry: 5:00 PM (JST))* Times are the same for all 3 days. Makuhari Messe International Exhibition Halls 4-8 & Makuhari Event Hallhololive SUPER EXPO 2026 Venue Tickets ãƒ» hololive SUPER EXPO 2026 DAY1 (March 6, 2026) ãƒ» hololive SUPER EXPO 2026 DAY2 (March 7, 2026) ãƒ» hololive SUPER EXPO 2026 DAY3 (March 8, 2026) Entry Tickets: Â¥6,600 (for each day)* There are no multi-day/event tickets/passes available. * Wristbands will be handed out at the door on the day of the event. * A maximum of 2 tickets can be purchased per person. * Fees may be added to the ticket price at time of payment. Please check the ticket application page for more details. * All prices are tax included. TIME WARP Clear Bandsâ– Ticket Sale Dates/Timesãƒ» 1st Round of Advance Lottery (Lawson Ticket / ZAIKO) Application Period: December 8, 2025, 8:00 PM (JST) â€“ December 14, 2025, 11:59 PM (JST) Lottery Results / Payment Period: December 18, 2025, 3:00 PM (JST) â€“ December 22, 2025, 11:00 PM (JST) Seat Number Display: From February 1, 2026, 12:00 PM (JST)ãƒ» 2nd Round of Advance Lottery (Lawson Ticket / ZAIKO) Application Period: December 19, 2025, 12:00 PM (JST) â€“ December 23, 2025, 11:59 PM (JST) Lottery Results / Payment Period: December 27, 2025, 3:00 PM (JST) â€“ January 5, 2026, 11:00 PM (JST) Seat Number Display: From February 1, 2026, 12:00 PM (JST)ãƒ» 3rd Round of Advance Lottery (Lawson Ticket / ZAIKO) Application Period: December 28, 2025, 12 PM (JST) â€“ January 7, 2026, 11:59 PM (JST) Lottery Results / Payment Period: January 14, 2026, 3:00 PM (JST) â€“ January 19, 2026, 11:00 PM (JST) Seat Number Display: From February 1, 2026, 12:00 PM (JST)ãƒ» General Sales (Lawson Ticket / ZAIKO) Sales Period / Seat Number Display: From February 1, 2026, 12:00 PM (JST)* First come, first served.Overview of â€œhololive 7th fes. Ridinâ€™ on Dreams Supported By LAWSONâ€ hololive 7th fes. marks our seventh performance in the series.With this theme in our hearts, we continue to push boundaries with every performance.A total of four acts will take place on the hololive stage this year. With highly anticipated newcomers and beloved veterans, expect an explosion of emotion burning brighter than ever before. hololive 7th fes. Ridinâ€™ on Dreams Supported By LAWSON Organizer: COVER Corporation ãƒ» hololive STAGE1: March 6, 2026 Doors Open: 5:00 PM (JST) / Performance Starts: 6:30 PM (JST)ãƒ» hololive STAGE2: March 7, 2026 Doors Open: 11:30 AM (JST) / Performance Starts: 1:00 PM (JST)ãƒ» hololive STAGE3: March 7, 2026 Doors Open: 5:00 PM (JST) / Performance Starts: 6:30 PM (JST)ãƒ» hololive STAGE4: March 8, 2026 Doors Open 11:30 AM (JST) / Performance Starts: 1:00 PM (JST) Makuhari Messe International Exhibition Halls 1-3hololive 7th fes. Children will be able to watch all the performances from the special â€˜Family Combi Ticketsâ€™ that take into consideration the height of the children. ãƒ» hololive 7th fes. item.title: hololive English x DOKO KOKO CAFÃ‰ Collaboration Cafe in Malaysia from December 18
item.author: os_pr
item.content:encoded: December 8, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is pleased to announce a collaboration between DOKO KOKO CAFÃ‰ in Malaysia and the five members of hololive English -Advent-. During this period, Shiori Novella, Koseki Bijou, Nerissa Ravencroft, and FUWAMOCO will appear in an exclusive â€œCyberpunk Maidâ€ theme, which will also inspire the cafeâ€™s interior design, menu, and limited-edition merchandise. This collaboration cafe kicks off on December 18, 2025.Inside the cafÃ©, fans will find a fully themed setup featuring life-size displays of all five members, neon cyberpunk elements, chibi character decorations, and signature motifs that bring the Cyberpunk Maid concept to life.The collaboration menu will include 5 main dishes, 6 desserts, and 5 drinks, each crafted with details inspired by the hololive English -Advent members. During the event, each dish and beverage will be accompanied by a random coaster, and each dessert will be accompanied by a random fragrance tag. In addition, a special Christmas-themed food and beverage set will be available exclusively during Christmas week.For any additional information and important updates please check DOKO KOKO CAFÃ‰â€™s Official Facebook Page and Reservation Site.Collaboration Cafe Start Date: December 18, 2025 DOKO KOKO CAFÃ‰, G20A & B, Lalaport BBCC, 2, Jln Hang Tuah, Bukit Bintang, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia11:00 AM â€“ 8:30 PM* Eating time is limited to 80 minutes * The restaurant zone closes at 8:30 PMâ– Acrylic Stand: RM 99 Chibi Acrylic Stand: RM 59 Acrylic Keychain: RM 48 Random Blind Badge (12 Variation): RM 28 Random Clear Card (11 Variation): RM 20 File Folder (3 Variation): RM 20Collaboration CafÃ© Menu DetailsSpecial Dessert: The Cellâ€™s Sweet Pot* Get a random fragrance tag with any dessert purchase!Doko Koko is a creative concept cafÃ© and retail brand from Malaysia. Known for its immersive IP collaboration experiences, themed menus, and exclusive merchandise, Doko Koko connects fans with the worlds they love through curated events, pop-ups, and community-driven activities.

item.title: hololive production OFFICIAL POP-UP SHOP to Open in Tokyo Stationâ€™s First Avenue!

Please check all reservation terms and conditions via the website below before making a reservation.* We may limit the amount each customer can purchase of certain products depending on sales. * We are preparing sufficient stock, but we appreciate your understanding that there is a possibility that items may sell out. * We will not be able to answer any questions about product availability (stock numbers, restocking details, etc.). Message cards will be handed out to all customers who make a purchase.

item.title: UNDONE x hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony Collection Available for Pre-Order from December 3rd!
item.author: narita
item.content:encoded: December 4, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced another collaboration with UNDONE and hololive production to launch a new collection to celebrate the unforgettable hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony in 2025, featuring nine hololive production talents: Hoshimachi Suisei, Shirakami Fubuki, Sakura Miko, Houshou Marine, Tokoyami Towa, Ouro Kronii, Hakos Baelz, Kobo Kanaeru and Koseki Bijou.This yearâ€™s collaboration transforms the music, lights, and emotions of the festivalâ€™s three stages into an exclusive lineup of collectible art pieces. The lineup features four distinct heirlooms to be treasured forever: the Watch & Projector Box Set, the Slide Film Lightbox & Keychain, the Lightbox Bluetooth Speaker, and the Collectorâ€™s Pin Collection.The hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony Collectionâ– Hero Item: Watch & Projector Box Set Elevate your collection with the Watch & Projector Box Set, a limited-edition centerpiece. This ultimate artifact is designed to bring the concert directly to you.â– The 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony Watch Series Each watch reflects one of the nine hololive production talents. From the dialâ€™s iconic hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony outfit and signature icon to the penlight-inspired elements that glow with concert energy, every detail embodies the spirit of the event. The case back showcases a lenticular design with 2â€“3 stacked images, producing a captivating illusion of motion that brings the talentâ€™s performance to life.â– Exclusive Mini Projector (Not for Sale) This exclusive centerpiece comes with a custom hololive 6th fes. Color Rige Harmony film reel, meticulously crafted to feature all nine talents.Simply insert the film to project a rotating gallery of iconic stage visuals onto any wall, transforming any space into a personal concert hall.â– A Unique Talentâ€™s Card and A Special Warranty Card This exclusive unique talentâ€™s card features the same talent as your selected watch, creating a perfectly matched set to celebrate your favorite talent.Exclusive Merchandise Line-upâ– Lightbox Bluetooth Speaker Immerse yourself in the music and visuals of hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony. This premium Bluetooth speaker features 12 interchangeable panels, one for each of the 9 featured talents plus 3 special group shots, letting you display your favorite talent while filling your space with crystal-clear sound.â– Slide Film Lightbox & Keychain Preserve the concertâ€™s most iconic moments. This set includes a classic lightbox for radiant home display and a portable keychain. It comes with two exclusive slides: a stunning solo shot and a cherished group photo. Display the solo shot in the lightbox at home, or carry the group photo in the keychain.â– Collectorâ€™s Pin Collection A meticulously crafted set featuring all nine talents, perfect for showcasing your support.December 3, 2025, 10:00 AM EST â€“ February 28, 2026, 11:59 PM EST Set a reminder and be ready to preorder the moment the collection drops!UNDONE, established in 2014, is the pioneer of customized watches. Known for blending traditional craftsmanship with modern personalization, UNDONE empowers wearers to tell their unique stories.

item.title: ANIPLUS x hololive English -Advent- comes to AGF 2025 in South Korea, December 5-7
item.author: os_pr
item.content:encoded: November 27, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced a collaboration between ANIPLUS and hololive English -Advent- for AGF 2025 in South Korea, taking place on December 5 to 7, 2025. This collaboration includes a themed cafe as well as exclusive merchandise showcasing a new winter-themed key visual of the five members of hololive English -Advent-. This new merchandise will be available exclusively at the ANIPLUS MD booth, and includes products such as acrylic standees, can badges, and happi.Attendees of the event can also enjoy a collaboration menu inspired by hololive English -Advent-, which can be found at the ANIPLUS x hololive English -Advent- cafÃ© booth at AGF Korea.For more information, please check out the ANIPLUS and AGF Korea official social media accounts below.ANIPLUS x hololive English -Advent- Collaboration at AGF Korea Event Name: AGF 2025 Venue: Ilsan KINTEX, South Koreaâ– Collaboration CafÃ© Menu Caffeine Supply for our Listeners! hololive English -Advent-â€™s Americano Drink purchase comes with a photocard (1 of 10 designs) A Korean Dish recommended by hololive English -Advent-! Tender Beef Kimchi Fried Rice (Contains Fried Rice, Beef Brisket, Fried Egg, Seaweed) Food purchase comes with a mini-poster (1 of 2 designs) All purchases of ANIPLUS x hololive English -Advent- merchandise will come with a double-sided A4 Hologram Poster!

item.title: Regarding â€œNePoLaBo Major Announcementâ€ and â€œholoX Arrival Partyâ€
item.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
item.content:encoded: A â€œNePoLaBo Major Announcementâ€ that was scheduled for November 28, and â€œholoX Arrival Party,â€ which was scheduled for December 2, will be postponed following further discussions. We apologize for the inconvenience and concern this may cause to everyone who had been looking forward to these announcements.We will provide updated schedules as soon as they are decided. Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: Sharing the Same Joy Worldwide: What Does Localization Look Like at hololive production?
item.author: å¹³æ¾æ¢¨æ²™
item.content:encoded: The Wide-Ranging Work of LocalizationContent localization refers to the process of adapting content created in one country or region so it resonates naturally with users in another language or cultural setting: it is more than simply translating words. The role of our Localization Team requires an understanding of local customs, cultural context, regulations, and values, and adjusting expressions so the overall message feels authentic and reaches the audience effectively.Our Localization Team is made up of around ten members, covering a wide range of languages â€“ English, Indonesian, Spanish, Korean, and both Traditional and Simplified Chinese. Each language has its own in-house specialist, who also works with a network of freelance translators. The team is also supported by our subtitle production staff, who take care of technical tasks such as â€œspotting,â€ the process of working out when subtitles should appear on screen.Â Examples of Content We LocalizeVideos on the official channel (including the 3D animated series â€œholo no graffitiâ€ (hologra), variety segments, short videos, etc.)The manga series â€œhololive Alternativeâ€ (including â€œYamato Phantasia,â€ â€œVesta de Cooking,â€ and â€œUnderworld Academy Overload!!â€ï¼‰Subtitles for Blu-ray versions of real-life concertsTalent voice pack contentIndividual talent projects (e.g., â€œLegend of Polkaâ€ by Omaru Polka; members-only four-panel comics of Tsunomaki Watame, etc.)Â <Example> How We Localize hologra1.Subtitle staff does the spotting for the episode2.A script is prepared in a spreadsheet ready to be translated3.Translators for each language are assigned to input their translations(English, Spanish, Indonesian, Korean, Chinese, Thai subtitles)4.Localization staff for each region review and refine the translations5.Once everything is checked, the finalized version is used to create the subtitles<Example> How We Localize hololive Alternative Manga1.Japanese dialogue and sound effects are translated by localization staff or by external translators, who create the initial draft2.The translated text is inserted directly into the manga panels3.The Japanese and translated versions are reviewed side by side, and necessary adjustments are made4.Finally, our team carries out a Linguistic Quality Assurance check to ensure there are no typos or missing lines/sound effects.Â From NARUTO to GTO: How Entertainment Sparked Journeys to Learning JapaneseQuietly supporting COVERâ€™s global expansion behind the scenes are two members of the Localization Team with whom we sat down for this interview: team leaders Sriram Gurunathan (also known as Ram) and Natalia Solichin, who oversee English and Indonesian respectively.â€•â€•When did you both come to Japan, and when did you start working at COVER?I came to Japan from Indonesia seven years ago. After spending a few years studying Japanese, I worked at a gaming company where I handled translation and localization for social games before joining COVER in 2024.I arrived in Japan later than Natalia. Iâ€™m originally from India, and I began working with COVER around 2019 as a freelance translator from my home country. I was set to join the company in 2021, but the pandemic made it impossible to travel. Once I finally received permission to enter Japan, I moved here and officially joined the company in May of 2022.â€•â€•Since youâ€™re from India, is Hindi your first language?No, my first language is English. In India, English is one of the official languages, and many school curriculums are taught entirely in English, including mine.India has more than 450 regional languages â€“ some similar to one another and others completely different. Even distances as close as Tokyo and Kanagawa can see people speaking entirely different languages, not just different dialects. As my fatherâ€™s job required us to move frequently, I spent my childhood relocating to all kinds of places and each time we moved, I had to learn a new language. Looking back, I think that experience really strengthened my ability to pick up languages.â€•â€•What inspired you both to start learning Japanese?Japanese pop culture is hugely popular in Indonesia. I grew up watching manga and anime like â€œDoraemonâ€ and â€œNARUTO,â€ and that naturally made me curious about the country they came from. At one point, I even tried playing a NARUTO game without understanding any Japanese and as I kept playing, I slowly started to recognize katakana â€“ mainly because the character names were written in katakana.Â â€•â€•Thatâ€™s very true. The first names of Naruto, Sasuke, Sakura, and Hinata all appear in katakana, donâ€™t they?!Exactly. Thatâ€™s actually how I ended up learning Japanese: I started with katakana before moving on to hiragana, and then kanji.Â Iâ€™ve never met anyone who learned Japanese in that order! Most people start with hiragana, then katakana and after that kanji.Â It probably is a little unusual (lol). Even after that, I continued consuming other Japanese works that had been translated into Indonesian, but there were no translated versions of things such as (self-published works), and there were some that I really wanted to read, so that pushed me to start studying Japanese more seriously.Thatâ€™s actually a pretty common pattern among overseas learning Japanese (lol). About ten years ago, it was normal to wait six months to a year for the English versions of Japanese content to come out, so a lot of fans started learning Japanese simply because they wanted to read or watch things as soon as they could.Â In my case, the first Japanese show I ever watched was GTO, the one starring Takashi Sorimachi. I watched it with English subtitles and got completely hooked. After that, I spent the next seven years devouring all kinds of Japanese content and eventually, I could understand about 70 percent of it and thatâ€™s when I decided to start studying the language more seriously.Bringing Out Each Talentsâ€™s Charm Through Translationâ€•â€•What are some of the challenges you face when localizing Japanese content?One challenge is translating expressions that are commonly used in Japanese but donâ€™t exist in Indonesian. For example, phrases like â€œâ€ or â€œâ€ donâ€™t have direct equivalents. So I adjust them depending on the context â€“ sometimes as a greeting, or sometimes as a message of appreciation.Â Right. Instead of translating the words literally, we focus on what the phrase means in that specific situation and choose the wording that fits best.Â Thatâ€™s right. Another challenge is translating Japanese onomatopoeia. Manga often uses sound effects as if they were dialogue, like â€œrero-reroâ€ for licking or â€œsara-saraâ€ for the sound of writing. But in Indonesian, those kinds of onomatopoeia feel very unnatural. So in those cases, I usually rewrite them as descriptive sentences instead of trying to recreate the sound.Â When I first started translating, I remember wondering what â€œâ€ means in expressions such as â€œâ€ (staring intently). Japanese onomatopoeia can be tricky even when translating into English.â€•â€•Content from hololive production seems especially challenging to localize, since each talent has their own unique way of speaking and distinct character.Â Thatâ€™s true. hologra, in particular, is a comedy-style show with lots of wordplay in Japanese, so localizing it can be quite tough.Â Comedyâ€¦ Iâ€™m not sure thatâ€™s the right word (lol). To me, it feels more like â€œ(nonsense humor)â€ â€“ the kind of charm that comes from things being slightly nonsensical. For example, the maid cafe episode was absolute chaos.â€•â€•Youâ€™re talking about the â€œU Maid?â€ episode, right?It was the episode where Shirakami Fubuki, La+ Darkness, and Omaru Polka â€“ classic old-school otaku types â€“ dote on FUWAMOCO (Fuwawa Abyssgard and Mococo Abyssgard), who are dressed as maids. The whole thing was filled with otaku slang and internet memes like â€œ, â€œ,â€ and â€œ.â€ There was no way to translate them literally, so I replaced them with English slang and memes that would convey a similar vibe.Â Â For the Indonesian subtitles, I use Indonesian memes instead.Â â€•â€•So, even though the wording wasnâ€™t exactly the same as the original Japanese, you chose English or Indonesian expressions that still have that slightly old-school, otaku-like feel. That sounds like quite a challenge.Â Surprisingly, that part was actually pretty easy for me. Iâ€™m an old-school otaku myself, so all the phrases just came naturally (lol). Translating otaku terms comes with its own set of challenges, though. Take â€œ,â€ for example. In English-speaking otaku circles, the word â€œâ€ is already widely used, so I understand why many people think we should simply keep it as is. But as an official localization team, we want the content to be enjoyable for fans who arenâ€™t necessarily familiar with otaku culture, which is why I intentionally choose words that are easier for a broader audience to understand.â€•â€•How would you translate it?There are expressions like â€œhot and cold,â€ but that isnâ€™t really well-received among otaku. Theyâ€™ll say, â€œWhy does it start with the â€˜dere (hot)â€™ part?â€ since the whole point of â€˜â€™ is that someone goes from feeling â€˜ (cold)â€™ to â€˜ (hot)â€™. â€ So when I translate it, I adjust the wording each time depending on the context.â€œâ€ is also tricky to translate into Indonesian. Sometimes I adapt it depending on the context, and other times I add a brief note explaining what â€œâ€ means.Â Â Adding explanations is another option too. But weâ€™ve been doing it less and less lately because, with entertainment content, itâ€™s important that people understand things instantly, so we try not to make it feel too much like studying.Exactly. I think itâ€™s all about finding the right balance so the subtitles remain easy to read as part of the content. Indonesian subtitles tend to be longer than those in Japanese or Chinese, so they can easily take up more space. But if viewers are too busy reading the subtitles to enjoy the content itself, that defeats the purpose. So while keeping translations accurate, I try to keep them as short as possible â€“ ideally within two lines.Â As the official localization team, we also see it as our role to keep each talentâ€™s image consistent across different regions. In the VTuber community, fans often add their own translations to clipped videos, which creates a culture of many different interpretations. That means a single phrase can end up with multiple translations depending on whoâ€™s doing it. For example, take the unique greeting â€œTisâ€™ I!â€ (â€œYo dayo~â€) used by Nakiri Ayame. Everyone has translated it differently, so by providing an official translation through hololive productionâ€™s content, weâ€™re able to offer something that fans can consider a standard translation.Â â€•â€•That makes sense. The words you choose in translation can really shape how a character comes across â€“ cute, serious, playful, and so on. Thatâ€™s a big responsibility.Exactly. Thatâ€™s why we research each talent carefully, including watching their streams, so we can produce translations that feel natural and stay true to their personality.Sharing the Same Joy Across Languages and Cultures Through Localizationâ€•â€•Is there a project that left a strong impression on you?For me, it would be the hologra graduation episode for Nanashi Mumei, titled â€œMemories I Will Not Forget.â€ Itâ€™s the episode where Nanashi Mumei visits other talents before graduating, and thereâ€™s a scene where Anya Melfissa from hololive Indonesia prepares a whole stack of stone tablets covered in ancient writing just so Nanashi Mumei can get to know her better. In the scene, Nanashi Mumei reads the ancient inscriptions with ease, which really impresses everyone around her, but in the original script, those â€œancient charactersâ€ were just random strings of text. I felt that instead of having her read out meaningless letters, having her read the inscriptions in Javanese would give more context to the tablets in relation to Anyaâ€™s lore and make the moment feel more authentic.When I pitched this idea, they decided to run with it. I also recorded the Javanese lines for reference and shared them with Nanashi Mumei, who used them during the actual recording. After the episode was released, seeing that fans had noticed and reacted with comments like, â€œNanashi Mumei is speaking Javanese!â€ and â€œThey even localize such small details like that?â€ made me really happy.Â One project that has really remained with me was when I localized the lyrics for Hoshimachi Suiseiâ€™s â€œStellar Stellarâ€ music video. I translated the English subtitles so they could actually be sung along with the melody, which was quite a challenge. Hoshimachi Suisei once mentioned that she wrote the lyrics after extensively reading The Little Prince, so I wanted the English version to subtly reflect that. Not by stating it outright, but in a way that would make attentive listeners think, â€œIs this inspired by The Little Prince?â€ Striking that balance was tricky, but taking a deep dive into the lyrics and searching for the best possible wording made the whole process both challenging and enjoyable.Â Translating Japanese song lyrics is pretty difficult, isnâ€™t it?It is. Even when the lyrics are abstract or donâ€™t specify a subject, they still make sense in Japanese. But that doesnâ€™t work the same way in English or Indonesian â€“ we have to decide who the lyrics are referring to or to whom something belongs. I struggle with that every single time, but music is something people can enjoy regardless of language â€“ itâ€™s universal. And thatâ€™s exactly what we aim for as a localization team. So I really want to keep putting energy into lyric localization for music videos moving forward.Â ãƒ¼ãƒ¼Have you noticed any differences in how fans from different countries react to content?Our job in localization is to minimize those differences. Even if the language they receive is different, the goal is for fans everywhere to have the same experience and the same sense of enjoyment. If thereâ€™s still a gap in that sense, it means we havenâ€™t done our jobs well.Â Localization is all about making content feel just as natural in different languages and cultures. Thatâ€™s the challenging part, but itâ€™s also what makes the work so enjoyable.Â â€•â€•Lastly, what do you find most rewarding about working in localization at COVER?Iâ€™ve spent countless hours enjoying Japanese entertainment, and Iâ€™m genuinely grateful for all the great moments it has given me. Now, being able to help share that same content with fans around the world feels deeply rewarding.Â At COVER, thereâ€™s a strong commitment to global expansion, and the Localization Team plays a key role in that. That certainly comes with some added pressure, but when a localization project turns out well, the sense of accomplishment is huge.Â It really does come with a lot of responsibility. Since each language has just one person in charge, you feel almost like the representative for that language within COVER. For anyone who wants to take on meaningful, high-impact work, I think this is an incredibly rewarding place to be.

item.title: Takanashi Kiara and Ninomae Inaâ€™nis to Star in Their Shared Concert, â€œTakanashi Kiara / Ninomae Inaâ€™nis 1st Concert â€˜Drawn to Dawnâ€™â€ at The Wiltern in Los Angeles, March 27th and 28th, 2026!
item.author: narita
item.content:encoded: November 24, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is excited to announce the first-ever joint concert headlined by hololive English -Myth- talents Takanashi Kiara and Ninomae Inaâ€™nis. Taking place on March 27th and 28th, 2026 at The Wiltern in Los Angeles, â€œTakanashi Kiara / Ninomae Inaâ€™nis 1st Concert â€˜Drawn to Dawnâ€™â€ will feature various performances from both of the starring talents.Streaming tickets are now on sale from November 24, 2025 onwards on platforms SPWN and Streaming+. Venue tickets for the event will go on sale December 4th at 4:00PM PST.Takanashi Kiara/Ninomae Inaâ€™nis 1st Concert â€œDrawn to Dawnâ€ OverviewTakanashi Kiara/Ninomae Inaâ€™nis 1st Concert â€œDrawn to Dawnâ€ Organized by: COVER Corporation Takanashi Kiara / Ninomae Inaâ€™nis Day 1: Friday, March 27, 2026 Doors Open: 6:30PM / Streaming starts: 7:30PM / Starts: 8:00PM (PDT) Day 2: Saturday, March 28, 2026 Doors Open: 6:30PM / Streaming starts: 7:30PM / Starts: 8:00PM (PDT)ãƒ» Early Entry GA Ticket: $130 ãƒ» GA Ticket: $105 ãƒ» FRONT Loge / FRONT Mezzanine: $160 ãƒ» REAR Loge / MIDDLE Mezzanine: $130 ãƒ» REAR Mezzanine: $95* Venue tickets will be available from December 4, 2025 at 4:00PM (PST)ãƒ» 1-DAY Streaming Ticket: March 27, 2026 (PDT) ãƒ» 1-DAY Streaming Ticket: March 28, 2026 (PDT) ãƒ» 2-DAY Stream Pass: March 27 & 28, 2026 (PDT)â– Streaming Ticket Purchase Links ãƒ» SPWN: https://spwn.jp/events/evt_26032802-engkiarainanis1st ãƒ» Streaming+: https://eplus.jp/takanashikiara_1st-st* Streaming tickets will be sold until April 28, 2026 at 8:00 PM (PDT) * Once the performance has ended and the archive is ready, you will be able to watch the archived stream as much as you like until 11:59 PM April 25, 2026 (PDT) * After 11:59 PM April 28, 2026 (PDT) the performance archive will no longer be available for viewing.Details regarding this concertâ€™s merchandise will be released at a later time, so please stay tuned for future updates via our official social media channels.Upcoming Album Release OverviewTakanashi Kiara and Ninomae Inaâ€™nis are also releasing a new album and EP respectively.

item.content:encoded: November 21, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€” COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan, CEO: Motoaki Tanigo) announces that beginning November 23, 2025 12:00 (JST), viewers will be able to enjoy â€œhololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Futureâ€ through two platforms: ãƒ» A full-version viewing event and watch party via the metaverse platform , and ãƒ» A on the official hololive Indonesia channel.This initiative is designed to let even more fans experience the excitement of the anniversary concert firsthand.Chromatic Future â€“ Watch Party in HoloearthA will be held on , where the can be viewed in its entirety. Additionally, a with and is planned during the event period.For full details, please see the links below: November 23, 2025 (Sun) 12:00 â€“ December 4, 2025 (Thu) 17:59* Schedule subject to change. 1,500 JPY (tax included)â– Special Watch Party Appearances ãƒ» November 24 (Mon) from 22:30 JST â€“ Vestia Zeta ãƒ» November 26 (Wed) from 22:30 JST â€“ Moona Hoshinova November 23, 2025 (Sun) 12:00 â€“ December 4, 2025 (Thu) 17:59* Schedule subject to change. Install Holoearth and purchase the in-app item ID Card Case â€œChromatic Futureâ€ Ver.* Available only on Windows.Chromatic Future â€“ Free Partial YouTube Release Starting November 23, 2025 (Sun) 12:00 (JST), a partial version of the concert will be available for free on the official hololive Indonesia YouTube channel.

item.title: â€œhololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Futureâ€ in Holoearth Announcement
item.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
item.content:encoded: Greetings from the Holoearth Management Team!From November 22nd (Sat), 2025 (PT) â€œhololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Futureâ€ will be streamed in Holoearth! During the event period the of â€œChromatic Futureâ€ will be available for viewing in the specially prepared viewing area.Vestia Zeta and Moona Hoshinova of hololive Indonesia will also arrive in Holoearth on November 24th and November 26th, respectively!(Schedules are subject to change.) Anyone can join in the festivities by downloading and installing Holoearth and purchasing the ID Card Case â€œChromatic Futureâ€ Ver. item in-app. (Note: Holoearth is available only on Windows.)â€œChromatic Futureâ€ Watch Parties in HoloearthWe will hold watch parties where the full â€œhololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Futureâ€ concert can be watched in Holoearth in the specially prepared â€œhololive Indonesia LIVE Viewing Areaâ€! Pacific Time between November 22nd (Sat) and December 3rd (Wed) starting daily at: 02:00 PT 06:00 PT Note: December 3rd at 19:00 is the final showing. â€œhololive Indonesia LIVE Viewing Areaâ€ in Holoearth.Accessing the Watch Party Viewing Areaãƒ»Playback timing may vary depending on your system environment. ãƒ»To adjust the volume of content playing in the hololive Indonesia LIVE Viewing Area, go to Options (Esc) and adjust the â€œMediaâ€ volume setting. ãƒ»Taking screenshots and posting them & impressions on social media is allowed. ãƒ»Posting videos without audio up to 30 sec. long on social media is allowed. ãƒ»The viewing area cannot be entered without purchasing the â€œID Card Case â€œChromatic Futureâ€ Ver.â€ item. ãƒ»Purchasing the â€œID Card Case â€œChromatic Futureâ€ Ver.â€ item requires HoloCoin (Premium). ãƒ»Purchasing the â€œID Card Case â€œChromatic Futureâ€ Ver.â€ item allows entry to the viewing area any number of times. ãƒ»For the Holoearth streams of Moona Hoshinova and Vestia Zeta, only the free portion of the event will be viewable on YouTube.A new item will be available at the hololive production official shop in HOLOEARTH. Note: Purchase of this item is required to enter the viewing area.750 HoloCoin (Regular) (1,500 JPY equivalent (tax inclusive).) (Schedule is subject to change.) ãƒ»ID Card Case â€œChromatic Futureâ€ Ver.Special hololive Indonesia-themed penlights will also be added, which can be used with gestures to show support in Holoearth! November 21st (Fri) 05:00 (PT) (Schedule is subject to change.) ãƒ»Penlight Ayunda Risu ver. ãƒ»Penlight Moona Hoshinova ver. ãƒ»Penlight Airani Iofifteen ver. ãƒ»Penlight Kureiji Ollie ver. ãƒ»Penlight Anya Melfissa ver. ãƒ»Penlight Pavolia Reine ver. ãƒ»Penlight Vestia Zeta ver. ãƒ»Penlight Kaela Kovalskia ver. ãƒ»Penlight Kobo Kanaeru ver.Note: These penlights are held in both hands when used. These items cannot be used in the Simulation Room, My Room, or My Shop.Text plate items will also be added that include phrases related to hololive Indonesia talents. November 21st (Fri) 05:00 (PT) (Schedule is subject to change.) ãƒ»Text Plate Ayunda Risu 1 x 3 (Risu / Risu-chan / Hewrroo / Brrrr / Ohawroo) ãƒ»Text Plate Moona Hoshinova 1 x 3 (Moona / Moona (JP) / Moon Moon / MONYAA / Otsumoona) ãƒ»Text Plate Airani Iofifteen 1 x 3 (Iofi / Iofi (JP) / Yopi / Otsulonpas / Obisa!) ãƒ»Text Plate Kureiji Ollie 1 x 3 (Ollie / Ollie-chan / OTSUCRAZY!! / OHAYOLLIE!! / ZOMBANWA!!!) ãƒ»Text Plate Anya Melfissa 1 x 3 (Anya / Anya (JP) / ANYAA / Otsukeris / Yahhoâ€”!) ãƒ»Text Plate Pavolia Reine 1 x 3 (Reine Ojou-sama / Reine / Reine-chan / Gokigenyou / Ganba-Reine!) ãƒ»Text Plate Vestia Zeta 1 x 3 (Zeta / Zeta-chan / Zecretary / o7 / Otsuzeta!) ãƒ»Text Plate Kaela Kovalskia 1 x 3 (Kaela / Kaela-chan / Kaela-shin / ELA / Kaello~) ãƒ»Text Plate Kobo Kanaeru 1 x 3 (Kobo / Kobo-chan / Kobo (JP) / Moshi moshi! / Lucu Banget!)Note: Text plates are consumable items. These items cannot be used in the Simulation Room, My Room, or My Shop. â€œText Plate Kureiji Ollie 1â€ is the same set that was available during Kureiji Ollieâ€™s Arrival Fest.

item.title: tsun scoops x hololive English Collaboration Starting on November 23!
item.author: narita
item.content:encoded: November 21, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN â€“ COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is excited to announce a collaboration between Californian ice cream parlor tsun scoops and hololive English. This sweet event brings ice cream together with hololive English talents IRyS and FUWAMOCO, as well as a lineup of exclusive merchandise available both online and in-store from November 23 to December 31.During the event, tsun scoops will transform into a dreamy hololive English paradise, decorated with original key visuals of your favorite talent. Three custom flavors inspired by IRyS, Fuwawa Abyssgard, and Mococo Abyssgard will be available for attendees to try, including:: A strawberry sorbet with vanilla ice creamãƒ» Fuwawaffule and Blueberries: Waffle-flavored ice cream with maple syrup and blueberriesãƒ» Mococustard Strawberry Parfait: Custard-flavored ice cream with strawberries and granola tsun scoops, 13137 Brookhurst St., Garden Grove CA 92843 ãƒ» Monday-Friday: 2PM-9PM ãƒ» Saturday-Sunday: 1PM-9PM November 23, 2025 to December 31, 2025 Donâ€™t miss out on exclusive collaboration merchandise featuring IRyS and FUWAMOCO, available on-site during the event as well as online on tsun scoopsâ€™s official website. Items include hoodies, t-shirts, acrylic keychains, acrylic standees, and bowls.tsun scoops is a California-based premium ice cream parlor that has built its reputation through several anime and game collaborations. Proud to be an Asian-owned business, tsun scoops combines anime culture and aesthetics with a range of delicious flavors, including dairy-free options.
